Title: When Marnie Was There
Writer: Joan G. Robinson (based on the novel by), Keiko Niwa (screenplay by), Masashi Ando (screenplay by), Hiromasa Yonebayashi (screenplay by), David Freedman (screenplay adaptation by: English)
Actors: Sara Takatsuki, Kasumi Arimura, Nanako Matsushima, Susumu Terajima
Plot: A 12-year-old girl is sent to the country for health reasons, where she meets an unlikely friend in the form of Marnie, a young girl with long, flowing blonde hair. As the friendship ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 17 nominations.
